formula.name: 4th Buffalo Partial Imag
formula.reference: Xrn = Xr2 * Xr2 + Xi2 * Xi2 - 6 * Xr2 * Xi2 + Cr; Xin = abs(4 * Xr * Xi * (Xr2 - Xi2)) + Ci;
formula.perturbation: xrn = 4 * Xr2 * Xr * xr + 6 * Xr2 * xr2 + 4 * Xr * xr2 * xr + xr2 * xr2 + 4 * Xi2 * Xi * xi + 6 * Xi2 * xi2 + 4 * Xi * xi2 * xi + xi2 * xi2 - 12 * Xr2 * Xi * xi - 6 * Xr2 * xi2 - 12 * Xr * xr * Xi2 - 24 * Xr * xr * Xi * xi - 12 * Xr * xr * xi2 - 6 * xr2 * Xi2 - 12 * xr2 * Xi * xi - 6 * xr2 * xi2 + cr; xin = diffabs(4 * Xr2 * Xr * Xi - 4 * Xr * Xi2 * Xi, - 4 * xr * Xi2 * Xi - 12 * xi * Xr * Xi2 - 12 * xr * xi * Xi2 + 12 * xr * Xr2 * Xi - 12 * xi2 * Xr * Xi + 12 * xr2 * Xr * Xi - 12 * xr * xi2 * Xi + 4 * xr2 * xr * Xi + 4 * xi * Xr2 * Xr + 12 * xr * xi * Xr2 - 4 * xi2 * xi * Xr + 12 * xr2 * xi * Xr - 4 * xr * xi2 * xi + 4 * xr2 * xr * xi) + ci;
